## VertexColorNode class

Vertex color input node

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class VertexColorNode extends BaseGraphNode 
```
**Extends:** [BaseGraphNode](doc/markdown/./scene.basegraphnode.md)

## Remarks

Provides access to per-vertex color data from the mesh. Vertex colors are stored as RGBA values (vec4) and can be used for: - Hand-painted color variations - Ambient occlusion baking - Blend weights for texture mixing - Custom data encoded in color channels

Outputs: - Output 1: Full RGBA color (vec4) - Output 2: Red channel (float) - Output 3: Green channel (float) - Output 4: Blue channel (float) - Output 5: Alpha channel (float)

## Example


```typescript
const vertexColor = new VertexColorNode();

// Use full color
baseColorNode.connectInput(1, vertexColor, 1);

// Use individual channels
roughnessNode.connectInput(1, vertexColor, 2); // Red as roughness
metallicNode.connectInput(1, vertexColor, 3); // Green as metallic
```
